Method Detail

getColorNumber

public int getColorNumber()
Returns the color index detected by the sensor.

Returns:
Color index.
  • 0 = black
  • 1 = violet
  • 2 = purple
  • 3 = blue
  • 4 = green
  • 5 = lime
  • 6 = yellow
  • 7 = orange
  • 8 = red
  • 9 = crimson
  • 10 = magenta
  • 11 to 16 = pastels
  • 17 = white

    • getRed

    public int getRed()
    Returns the red saturation of the color.

    Returns:
    red value (0 to 255).

    getGreen

    public int getGreen()
    Returns the green saturation of the color.

    Returns:
    green value (0 to 255).

    getBlue

    public int getBlue()
    Returns the blue saturation of the color.

    Returns:
    blue value (0 to 255).
